A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The best thing I can say about this movie is that it is definitely in my "Top 10" of favorite Star Wars films.

"The Force Awakens" set up the possibility that this series has more to say or explore within the Star Wars universe. "The Last Jedi" vehemently refutes this by rehashing content without adding substance. 

As a stand-alone film it succeeds in being mildly amusing\, albeit forgettable. As a part of a saga it does a great disservice to the conflict and the characters it's developed so far\, and not-so-subtly insults the intelligence of people who actually care about that sort of thing.
